mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT bookshelf.isbn FROM bookshelf INNER JOIN appraisal ON bookshelf.book_status_num = appraisal.book_status_num GROUP BY bookshelf.isbn ORDER BY AVG(appraisal.star) DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT * FROM (SELECT bookshelf.isbn, appraisal.star, appraisal.book_comment, member.mem_id FROM appraisal INNER JOIN bookshelf ON bookshelf.book_status_num = appraisal.book_status_num INNER JOIN member ON bookshelf.mem_num = member.mem_num WHERE appraisal.co_prv='공개' ORDER BY appraisal.APPRAISAL_NUM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
